49//*****************************************************************************
50#ifndef AM_UTIL_STRING_H
51#define AM_UTIL_STRING_H
52
53#ifdef __cplusplus
54extern "C"
55{
56#endif
57
58//*****************************************************************************
59//
60// Character attributes lookup table defines.
61//
62//*****************************************************************************
63#define AM_CATTR_NONE 0x00
64#define AM_CATTR_ALPHA 0x01
65#define AM_CATTR_LOWER 0x02
66#define AM_CATTR_UPPER 0x04
67#define AM_CATTR_DIGIT 0x08
68#define AM_CATTR_XDIGIT 0x10
69#define AM_CATTR_WHSPACE 0x20
70#define AM_CATTR_FILENM83 0x80
71
72//
73// Set MINIMIZE_CATTR_TABLE to 1 to configure for minimal CATTR table size,
74// (256 instead of 512 bytes) but at a cost of slightly larger code size.
75// However, setting this option also provides an additional level of checking
76// of the argument; if the argument is not a uint8_t, the functions are
77// guaranteed to return 0.
78//
79#define MINIMIZE_CATTR_TABLE 0
80
81//*****************************************************************************
82//
83// Globals
84//
85//*****************************************************************************
86extern const uint8_t am_cattr[];
87
88//*****************************************************************************
89//
90// External function definitions
91//
92//*****************************************************************************
93
94//*****************************************************************************
95//
109//
110//*****************************************************************************
111extern int32_t am_util_string_strcmp(const char *str1, const char *str2);
112
113//*****************************************************************************
114//
130//
131//*****************************************************************************
132extern int32_t am_util_string_stricmp(const char *str1, const char *str2);
133
134//*****************************************************************************
135//
150//
151//*****************************************************************************
152extern int32_t am_util_string_strncmp(const char *str1, const char *str2,
153 uint32_t num);
154
155//*****************************************************************************
156//
172//
173//*****************************************************************************
174extern int32_t am_util_string_strnicmp(const char *str1, const char *str2,
175 int num);
176
177//*****************************************************************************
178//
186//
187//*****************************************************************************
188extern uint32_t am_util_string_strlen(const char *pcStr);
189
190//*****************************************************************************
191//
200//
201//*****************************************************************************
202extern char *am_util_string_strcpy(char *pcDst, const char *pcSrc);
203
204//*****************************************************************************
205//
222//
223//*****************************************************************************
224extern char *am_util_string_strncpy(char *pcDst, const char *pcSrc, uint32_t uNum);
225
226//*****************************************************************************
227//
241//
242//*****************************************************************************
243extern char *am_util_string_strcat(char *pcDst, const char *pcSrc);
244
245//*****************************************************************************
246//
247// Character "is" macros and functions
248//
249// By default all of the "is" functions are implemented as macros. To implement
250// as functions rather than macros, use a global compiler command line (-D)
251// option to define AM_UTIL_STRING_CTYPE_DISABLE_MACROS.
252//
253#ifdef AM_UTIL_STRING_CTYPE_DISABLE_MACROS
254//*****************************************************************************
255//
270//
271//*****************************************************************************
272extern int am_util_string_isalnum(int c);
273
274//*****************************************************************************
275//
290//
291//*****************************************************************************
292extern int am_util_string_isalpha(int c);
293
294//*****************************************************************************
295//
310//
311//*****************************************************************************
312extern int am_util_string_isdigit(int c);
313
314//*****************************************************************************
315//
330//
331//*****************************************************************************
332extern int am_util_string_islower(int c);
333
334//*****************************************************************************
335//
350//
351//*****************************************************************************
352extern int am_util_string_isspace(int c);
353
354//*****************************************************************************
355//
370//
371//*****************************************************************************
372extern int am_util_string_isupper(int c);
373
374//*****************************************************************************
375//
390//
391//*****************************************************************************
392extern int am_util_string_isxdigit(int c);
393
394//*****************************************************************************
395//
409//
410//*****************************************************************************
411extern int am_util_string_tolower(int c);
412
413//*****************************************************************************
414//
428//
429//*****************************************************************************
430extern int am_util_string_toupper(int c);
431
432//*****************************************************************************
433//
448//
449//*****************************************************************************
450extern int am_util_string_isfilenm83(int c);
451#else
452#if MINIMIZE_CATTR_TABLE
453#define am_util_string_isalnum(c) ((c & 0xffffff80) ? 0 : (am_cattr[c] & (AM_CATTR_ALPHA | AM_CATTR_DIGIT)) ? 1 : 0)
454#define am_util_string_isalpha(c) ((c & 0xffffff80) ? 0 : (am_cattr[c] & AM_CATTR_ALPHA) ? 1 : 0)
455#define am_util_string_isdigit(c) ((c & 0xffffff80) ? 0 : (am_cattr[c] & AM_CATTR_DIGIT) ? 1 : 0)
456#define am_util_string_islower(c) ((c & 0xffffff80) ? 0 : (am_cattr[c] & AM_CATTR_LOWER) ? 1 : 0)
457#define am_util_string_isspace(c) ((c & 0xffffff80) ? 0 : (am_cattr[c] & AM_CATTR_WHSPACE) ? 1 : 0)
458#define am_util_string_isupper(c) ((c & 0xffffff80) ? 0 : (am_cattr[c] & AM_CATTR_UPPER) ? 1 : 0)
459#define am_util_string_isxdigit(c) ((c & 0xffffff80) ? 0 : (am_cattr[c] & AM_CATTR_XDIGIT) ? 1 : 0)
460#define am_util_string_tolower(c) ((am_cattr[c & 0x7f] & AM_CATTR_UPPER) ? c | 0x20 : c)
461#define am_util_string_toupper(c) ((am_cattr[c & 0x7f] & AM_CATTR_LOWER) ? c & ~0x20 : c)
462#else
463#define am_util_string_isalnum(c) (am_cattr[c & 0xff] & (AM_CATTR_ALPHA | AM_CATTR_DIGIT))
464#define am_util_string_isalpha(c) (am_cattr[c & 0xff] & AM_CATTR_ALPHA)
465#define am_util_string_isdigit(c) (am_cattr[c & 0xff] & AM_CATTR_DIGIT)
466#define am_util_string_islower(c) (am_cattr[c & 0xff] & AM_CATTR_LOWER)
467#define am_util_string_isspace(c) (am_cattr[c & 0xff] & AM_CATTR_WHSPACE)
468#define am_util_string_isupper(c) (am_cattr[c & 0xff] & AM_CATTR_UPPER)
469#define am_util_string_isxdigit(c) (am_cattr[c & 0xff] & AM_CATTR_XDIGIT)
470#define am_util_string_tolower(c) ((am_cattr[c & 0xff] & AM_CATTR_UPPER) ? c | 0x20 : c)
471#define am_util_string_toupper(c) ((am_cattr[c & 0xff] & AM_CATTR_LOWER) ? c & ~0x20 : c)
472#endif // MINIMIZE_CATTR_TABLE
473
474#define am_util_string_isfilenm83(c) (am_cattr[c & 0xff] & AM_CATTR_FILENM83)
475#endif // AM_UTIL_STRING_CTYPE_DISABLE_MACROS
476
477#ifdef __cplusplus
478}
479#endif
480
481#endif // AM_UTIL_STRING_H
482
